situation.situation_description: Between 07:00 and 09:30 GMT, the person was detected in the bedroom, then moved to the bathroom at 07:10 GMT. At 07:30 GMT, they entered the kitchen, where the fridge was opened at 07:35 GMT. They remained in the kitchen until 08:00 GMT, then moved to the living room. The person stayed in the living room until 09:00 GMT, then briefly visited the porch at 09:15 GMT before returning to the hall by 09:30 GMT.

Between 11:00 and 12:45 GMT, the person was detected in the living room, where they remained until 11:30 GMT. They moved to the kitchen at 11:35 GMT, opened the fridge at 11:40 GMT, and stayed in the kitchen until 12:15 GMT. They then moved to the bathroom at 12:20 GMT, where high humidity was recorded. They returned to the living room at 12:40 GMT.

Between 03:00 and 05:30 GMT, the person moved from bedroom to bathroom at 03:05 GMT, back to bedroom at 03:10 GMT, to bathroom again at 03:25 GMT, back to bedroom at 03:35 GMT, to bathroom at 04:00 GMT, to kitchen at 04:15 GMT where the fridge was opened multiple times in succession, then to the living room at 04:30 GMT, back to kitchen at 04:45 GMT, to bathroom at 05:00 GMT, and finally to the bedroom at 05:25 GMT.

Between 15:00 and 18:30 GMT, the person was in the living room from 15:00 GMT to 16:20 GMT. They then moved to the kitchen at 16:25 GMT, opened the fridge at 16:30 GMT, and stayed in the kitchen until 17:00 GMT. They moved to the bathroom at 17:05 GMT, stayed there until 17:20 GMT, then moved to the bedroom at 17:25 GMT where they remained until 18:00 GMT. They visited the porch from 18:05 GMT to 18:30 GMT.

Between 21:00 and 23:00 GMT, the person was detected in the living room until 21:30 GMT. They then moved to the kitchen at 21:35 GMT, opened the fridge at 21:40 GMT, and stayed in the kitchen until 22:00 GMT. They moved to the bathroom at 22:05 GMT, stayed until 22:20 GMT, then moved to the bedroom at 22:25 GMT where they remained.

Between 01:00 and 06:00 GMT, no movement was detected in any room. The person remained in the bedroom throughout this period with the last occupancy detection at 01:00 GMT and the next at 06:00 GMT. Temperature and humidity levels remained stable in all rooms.

Between 12:00 and 14:00 GMT, the person was detected in the kitchen at 12:00 GMT. The fridge was opened and closed 8 times between 12:05 GMT and 12:45 GMT. At 12:50 GMT, occupancy was detected in the bathroom, followed by the living room at 13:15 GMT, then back to the kitchen at 13:35 GMT where another 4 fridge openings occurred until 14:00 GMT.

Between 08:00 and 10:00 GMT, the person moved from the bedroom to the kitchen at 08:05 GMT. In the kitchen, the temperature increased from 20°C to 24°C between 08:10 GMT and 08:30 GMT. The person then moved to the bathroom at 08:40 GMT, where humidity increased to 80%. At 09:10 GMT, they moved to the living room, and at 09:50 GMT to the porch.

Between 06:45 and 09:30 GMT, the person was detected in the bedroom until 07:15 GMT, then moved to the bathroom. At 07:40 GMT, they entered the kitchen where the fridge was opened at 07:45 GMT and the kettle was turned on at 07:50 GMT. They remained in the kitchen until 08:20 GMT, then moved to the living room where they stayed until 09:15 GMT before returning to the bedroom.

Between 22:00 and 23:45 GMT, the person was detected moving from the living room to the kitchen at 22:15 GMT. The fridge was opened at 22:20 GMT, and again at 22:30 GMT, 22:40 GMT, 22:50 GMT, and 23:00 GMT. The person remained in the kitchen until 23:30 GMT, then moved to the bedroom.

Between 12:00 and 15:30 GMT, the person was detected in the living room. They remained there continuously until 15:30 GMT when they moved to the kitchen. The room temperature in the living room gradually increased from 22°C to 27°C during this period.

Between 01:00 and 05:30 GMT, the person was detected moving between the bedroom and bathroom repeatedly. At 01:15 GMT, they moved from the bedroom to the bathroom, then back to the bedroom at 01:30 GMT. This pattern repeated at 02:15 GMT, 03:00 GMT, 03:45 GMT, 04:30 GMT, and 05:15 GMT. The bathroom humidity sensor detected elevated humidity after each visit.

Between 16:00 and 18:30 GMT, the person was detected in the living room. At 16:30 GMT, they moved to the porch where the temperature sensor showed 15°C. They stayed on the porch until 17:00 GMT, then returned to the living room. At 17:45 GMT, they moved to the kitchen where the fridge was opened at 17:50 GMT, and remained there until 18:30 GMT.

Between 10:00 and 14:30 GMT, no movement was detected in any room of the house. The last occupancy detection was in the bedroom at 10:00 GMT. Environmental sensors continued to report temperature and humidity readings throughout this period.

Between 19:00 and 22:00 GMT, the person was detected in the living room until 19:45 GMT. They then moved to the kitchen where the stove was turned on at 19:50 GMT and off at 20:20 GMT. The fridge was opened at 20:05 GMT. At 20:30 GMT, they returned to the living room and stayed there until 21:45 GMT when they moved to the bedroom.

Between 23:00 and 06:00 GMT, the person was detected in the bedroom. The bedroom light was turned on at 23:15 GMT and remained on until 05:45 GMT. During this period, there were occasional movements detected within the bedroom, but no transition to other rooms.

Between 13:00 and 15:30 GMT, the person was detected in the kitchen. At 13:15 GMT, the fridge was opened. At 13:30 GMT, they moved to the living room where they stayed until 14:45 GMT. They then moved to the porch for 15 minutes, returned to the living room at 15:00 GMT, and finally moved back to the kitchen at 15:20 GMT.
Between 03:00 and 05:00 GMT, the person moved between the bedroom and bathroom multiple times. Elevated humidity readings were recorded in the bathroom.
Between 08:00 and 20:00 GMT, the person was detected in the living room. Temperature and occupancy readings were stable.
Between 07:00 and 08:00 GMT, the person took medication, used the bathroom, and prepared breakfast in the kitchen.
Between 10:00 and 11:00 GMT, the person experienced a fall in the bathroom. Elevated humidity readings were recorded.
Between 12:00 and 13:00 GMT, the person prepared a meal in the kitchen and then relaxed in the living room.

Between 06:30 and 08:45 GMT, the person was detected in the bedroom. At 06:45 GMT, they moved to the bathroom. At 07:15 GMT, they entered the kitchen where the fridge was opened at 07:20 GMT. The kitchen faucet was turned on at 07:25 GMT and off at 07:35 GMT. They remained in the kitchen until 08:00 GMT, then moved to the living room until 08:45 GMT.

Between 23:00 and 03:30 GMT, the person was detected moving repeatedly between the bedroom and bathroom. At 23:00 GMT, they were in the bedroom. At 23:45 GMT, they moved to the bathroom, returning to the bedroom at 00:15 GMT. At 01:20 GMT, they went to the bathroom again, returning to the bedroom at 01:40 GMT. At 02:30 GMT, they went to the bathroom again, with high humidity detected at 02:35 GMT, returning to the bedroom at 03:00 GMT. At 03:30 GMT, they went to the bathroom once more.

Between 12:00 and 14:30 GMT, the person was detected in the kitchen. At 12:05 GMT, the fridge was opened, and closed at 12:07 GMT. At 12:15 GMT, the stove was turned on, and off at 12:45 GMT. The temperature in the kitchen rose to 26°C at 12:30 GMT. At 13:00 GMT, they moved to the living room. At 13:30 GMT, they returned to the kitchen briefly, then went back to the living room at 13:45 GMT until 14:30 GMT.

Between 02:00 and 05:00 GMT, no movement was detected in any room. The person was last detected in the bedroom at 02:00 GMT. The temperature in the bedroom remained constant at 19°C throughout this period.

Between 08:00 and 10:30 GMT, the person was detected in the bedroom until 08:15 GMT. They then moved to the bathroom until 08:40 GMT, with humidity increasing to 65% at 08:25 GMT. At 08:45 GMT, they entered the kitchen, where the fridge was opened at 08:50 GMT and closed at 08:52 GMT. The microwave was used from 09:00 GMT to 09:03 GMT. At 09:15 GMT, they moved to the living room, and at 10:00 GMT they went to the porch until 10:30 GMT.

Between 14:00 and 16:30 GMT, the person was detected in the living room. At 14:30 GMT, the TV was turned on. At 15:45 GMT, the temperature in the living room rose to 24°C. The TV remained on until 16:20 GMT, and the person remained in the living room until 16:30 GMT.

Between 22:00 and 22:45 GMT, the fridge in the kitchen was opened and closed 6 times, despite no occupancy being detected in the kitchen. The fridge was opened at 22:05 GMT, 22:12 GMT, 22:18 GMT, 22:25 GMT, 22:32 GMT, and 22:40 GMT, each time for approximately 15-20 seconds.

Between 17:00 and 19:30 GMT, the person was detected in the kitchen. At 17:10 GMT, the fridge was opened, and closed at 17:12 GMT. The stove was turned on at 17:20 GMT, and the temperature in the kitchen increased to 27°C by 17:40 GMT. The stove was turned off at 18:00 GMT. At 18:30 GMT, they moved to the living room, where the TV was turned on at 18:40 GMT. They remained in the living room until 19:30 GMT.

Between 10:00 and 12:30 GMT, the person was detected in the bedroom until 10:15 GMT. They then moved to the living room, where they remained until 11:45 GMT with the TV on from 10:30 GMT to 11:30 GMT. At 11:45 GMT, they moved to the porch, where they stayed until 12:10 GMT. They then moved to the kitchen until 12:30 GMT, where the fridge was opened at 12:15 GMT and closed at 12:17 GMT.

Between 01:00 and 06:00 GMT, the front door was opened and closed multiple times without any occupancy being detected. The door was opened at 01:15 GMT, 02:30 GMT, 03:45 GMT, and 05:00 GMT, each time for approximately 30 seconds.

Between 18:00 and 21:30 GMT, the person was detected in the living room watching TV. The TV was turned on at 18:10 GMT. At 19:30 GMT, they moved to the kitchen, where the microwave was used from 19:35 GMT to 19:38 GMT. The fridge was opened at 19:40 GMT and closed at 19:42 GMT. They returned to the living room at 20:00 GMT and remained there until 21:30 GMT, when the TV was turned off.

Between 09:00 and 10:30 GMT, the temperature in the living room dropped from 21°C to 15°C within 20 minutes, while the person was detected in the room. At 09:15 GMT, the window contact sensor indicated the window was opened. The window remained open until 10:00 GMT, when it was closed, and the temperature began to rise again.

Between 20:00 and 22:30 GMT, the person was detected in the living room until 21:00 GMT, with the TV on. At 21:00 GMT, they moved to the bedroom, where the bedside lamp was turned on at 21:05 GMT. The bathroom light was turned on at 21:30 GMT as they moved to the bathroom, and turned off at 21:45 GMT when they returned to the bedroom. The bedroom light was turned off at 22:30 GMT.

Between 03:00 and 05:30 GMT, the smoke detector in the kitchen was triggered at 03:15 GMT, but no occupancy was detected in any room until 03:30 GMT when the person was detected in the bedroom. At 03:45 GMT, they moved to the kitchen where they remained until 04:30 GMT, with the kitchen window being opened at 04:00 GMT and closed at 04:20 GMT. They returned to the bedroom at 04:30 GMT and remained there until 05:30 GMT.

Between 15:00 and 17:30 GMT, the person was detected in the living room until 15:45 GMT. At 15:45 GMT, they moved to the porch, where they remained until 16:30 GMT. The outside temperature was recorded at 22°C at 16:00 GMT. At 16:30 GMT, they returned to the living room until 17:00 GMT, then moved to the kitchen, where they remained until 17:30 GMT. The fridge was opened at 17:15 GMT and closed at 17:17 GMT.

Between 11:00 and 13:30 GMT, the water leak detector under the kitchen sink was triggered at 11:15 GMT. No occupancy was detected in the kitchen until 11:30 GMT, when the person entered. They remained in the kitchen until 13:00 GMT, during which time the water leak detector returned to normal at 12:45 GMT. The person then moved to the living room at 13:00 GMT, where they remained until 13:30 GMT.

Between 07:30 and 10:00 GMT, the person was detected in the bedroom until 08:00 GMT. They then moved to the bathroom, where humidity increased to 70% at 08:15 GMT, indicating shower use. At 08:30 GMT, they returned to the bedroom until 09:00 GMT, then moved to the kitchen, where the coffee maker was turned on at 09:05 GMT and off at 09:10 GMT. The fridge was opened at 09:15 GMT and closed at 09:17 GMT. At 09:30 GMT, they moved to the living room until 10:00 GMT.

Between 00:00 and 01:30 GMT, the medicine cabinet in the bathroom was opened and closed 5 times. At 00:10 GMT, the bathroom light was turned on and occupancy was detected. The medicine cabinet was opened at 00:15 GMT, 00:20 GMT, 00:25 GMT, 00:30 GMT, and 00:35 GMT, each time for approximately 10 seconds. The bathroom light was turned off at 00:45 GMT, and no further activity was detected until a brief bathroom visit at 01:15 GMT lasting until 01:30 GMT.

Between 13:00 and 15:30 GMT, the person was detected in the kitchen from 13:00 GMT to 13:45 GMT. During this time, the fridge was opened at 13:10 GMT and closed at 13:12 GMT, and the oven was turned on at 13:15 GMT and off at 13:40 GMT. The kitchen temperature increased to 25°C by 13:30 GMT. At 13:45 GMT, they moved to the living room, where they remained until 15:00 GMT with the TV on from 14:00 GMT to 14:45 GMT. At 15:00 GMT, they moved to the porch until 15:30 GMT.

Between 21:00 and 23:30 GMT, the person was detected in the living room watching TV until 21:45 GMT. They then moved to the kitchen, where the fridge was opened at 21:50 GMT and closed at 21:52 GMT. The microwave was used from 21:55 GMT to 21:58 GMT. At 22:10 GMT, they moved to the bedroom, where they remained until 22:30 GMT. At 22:30 GMT, they moved to the bathroom until 22:45 GMT, with humidity increasing to 60% at 22:35 GMT. They returned to the bedroom at 22:45 GMT and remained there until 23:30 GMT, when the bedroom light was turned off.

Between 06:30 and 08:45 GMT, the person was detected in the bedroom, then moved to the bathroom at 06:45 GMT. At 07:10 GMT, they entered the kitchen where the fridge was opened at 07:15 GMT and again at 07:25 GMT. The kitchen temperature was 21°C at 07:30 GMT. They remained in the kitchen until 07:50 GMT, then moved to the living room. The person stayed in the living room until 08:20 GMT, then returned to the bedroom by 08:45 GMT.

Between 22:00 and 23:45 GMT, the person was detected in the living room until 22:30 GMT. They then moved to the kitchen at 22:35 GMT where the fridge was opened at 22:40 GMT. At 22:45 GMT, they returned to the living room. At 23:00 GMT, they moved to the bedroom where the room temperature was 19°C. They remained in the bedroom until 23:45 GMT.

Between 01:20 and 03:45 GMT, the person was detected moving from the bedroom to the bathroom at 01:30 GMT. The bathroom humidity was measured at 65% at 01:35 GMT. They returned to the bedroom at 01:45 GMT. At 02:15 GMT, they again moved to the bathroom where the humidity increased to 75% at 02:20 GMT. They returned to the bedroom at 02:30 GMT and remained there until 03:45 GMT.

Between 12:00 and 14:30 GMT, the person was detected in the kitchen where the temperature was 22°C at 12:05 GMT. At 12:10 GMT, the fridge was opened and closed. They moved to the living room at 12:30 GMT where they remained until 13:45 GMT. They then moved to the porch at 13:50 GMT where the temperature was 25°C at 13:55 GMT. They returned to the living room at 14:15 GMT and remained there until 14:30 GMT.

Between 19:00 and 21:15 GMT, the person was detected in the living room where the light was turned on at 19:05 GMT. They moved to the kitchen at 19:30 GMT and the fridge was opened at 19:35 GMT and again at 19:45 GMT. The oven was turned on at 19:50 GMT. They remained in the kitchen until 20:30 GMT when they returned to the living room. The living room light was turned off at 21:10 GMT, and they moved to the bedroom at 21:15 GMT.

Between 02:00 and 05:30 GMT, the person was detected in the bedroom until 02:15 GMT. They then moved to the bathroom where the humidity increased to 70% at 02:20 GMT. They returned to the bedroom at 02:30 GMT. At 03:10 GMT, they moved to the kitchen. The fridge was opened at 03:15 GMT, 03:25 GMT, 03:40 GMT, 03:55 GMT, 04:10 GMT, and 04:25 GMT. They remained in the kitchen until 05:00 GMT when they returned to the bedroom and stayed there until 05:30 GMT.

Between 10:00 and 17:00 GMT, the person was detected in the living room at 10:00 GMT. The living room temperature was 21°C at 10:05 GMT. There was no movement or sensor activity detected in any room between 10:10 GMT and 16:45 GMT. At 16:45 GMT, movement was detected in the living room again. At 16:50 GMT, they moved to the kitchen, and at 17:00 GMT, they returned to the living room.

Between 14:00 and 15:30 GMT, the person was detected in the kitchen at 14:00 GMT. The fridge was opened at 14:05 GMT and the kitchen temperature was 22°C. At 14:20 GMT, they moved to the living room. At 14:40 GMT, they moved to the porch where the temperature was 18°C. They remained on the porch until 15:10 GMT when they returned to the living room and stayed there until 15:30 GMT.

Between 23:00 and 05:00 GMT, the person was detected in the bedroom at 23:00 GMT. At 00:15 GMT, 01:45 GMT, 02:30 GMT, 03:10 GMT, and 04:25 GMT, they moved from the bedroom to the bathroom and back within 10 minutes each time. The bathroom humidity increased to 68%, 70%, 65%, 72%, and 69% respectively during each visit. They remained in the bedroom between and after these bathroom visits until 05:00 GMT.

Between 06:45 and 08:30 GMT, the person was detected in the bedroom, then moved to the bathroom at 07:10 GMT. At 07:30 GMT, they entered the kitchen where the fridge was opened at 07:35 GMT. The kitchen temperature was 22°C at 07:40 GMT. They remained in the kitchen until 08:00 GMT, then moved to the living room until 08:30 GMT.

Between 13:00 and 15:30 GMT, the person was detected in the living room watching TV. The TV was turned on at 13:05 GMT and remained on until 15:25 GMT. At 14:10 GMT, they briefly went to the kitchen where the fridge was opened and closed within 2 minutes. They returned to the living room at 14:15 GMT and remained there until 15:30 GMT when they moved to the bedroom.

Between 02:00 and 05:30 GMT, the kitchen fridge was opened and closed repeatedly. The fridge was opened at 02:10 GMT, closed at 02:12 GMT, then opened again at 02:30 GMT, closed at 02:32 GMT. This pattern repeated at 03:15, 03:45, 04:20, and 05:00 GMT. The kitchen was detected as occupied during these periods.

Between 19:00 and 21:00 GMT, the person was detected in the living room. At 19:15 GMT, they turned on the TV. At 19:45 GMT, they moved to the kitchen where the microwave was used at 19:50 GMT. They returned to the living room at 20:05 GMT and turned off the TV at 20:45 GMT. At 21:00 GMT, they moved to the bedroom.

Between 22:00 and 06:00 GMT, the bedroom occupancy sensor did not detect any movement. The person was last detected entering the bedroom at 22:00 GMT, and no movement was registered until 06:00 GMT the next morning when they moved to the bathroom.

Between 10:00 and 12:30 GMT, the bathroom occupancy sensor detected presence continuously. The humidity sensor registered a steady increase from 45% at 10:10 GMT to 85% at 11:30 GMT, and then began decreasing. At 12:30 GMT, the person moved from the bathroom to the bedroom.

Between 14:00 and 16:30 GMT, the person moved from the living room to the porch at 14:15 GMT where they remained until 15:45 GMT. The outdoor temperature sensor registered 24°C at 14:30 GMT. They then returned to the living room at 15:45 GMT and remained there until 16:30 GMT when they moved to the kitchen.
Between 08:00 and 20:00 GMT, no occupancy was detected in any room of the house. The last detection was in the hall at 07:55 GMT, and the next detection was again in the hall at 20:05 GMT.

Between 12:00 and 13:30 GMT, the person moved from the living room to the kitchen at 12:15 GMT. In the kitchen, they opened the fridge at 12:20 GMT and closed it at 12:22 GMT. The microwave was used from 12:25 GMT to 12:28 GMT. The person remained in the kitchen until 13:00 GMT, then moved to the dining room until 13:30 GMT when they returned to the living room.

Between 03:00 and 06:00 GMT, the bedroom occupancy sensor detected movement at 03:15 GMT. The person then moved to the bathroom at 03:20 GMT, returned to the bedroom at 03:35 GMT. This pattern repeated at 04:10 GMT, 04:45 GMT, and 05:30 GMT, with brief visits to the bathroom each time. The humidity sensor in the bathroom showed increased readings during each visit.

Between 07:00 and 09:30 GMT, the person was detected in the bedroom, then moved to the bathroom at 07:15 GMT. At 07:45 GMT, they entered the kitchen where the fridge was opened at 07:50 GMT. They remained in the kitchen until 08:30 GMT, then moved to the living room. The person stayed in the living room until 09:15 GMT, then briefly returned to the bedroom by 09:30 GMT.

Between 23:00 and 01:30 GMT, the person was detected moving between the bedroom and bathroom multiple times. At 23:00 GMT, they were in the bedroom, then moved to the bathroom at 23:15 GMT, returning to the bedroom at 23:30 GMT. This pattern repeated with bathroom visits at 00:00 GMT, 00:45 GMT, and 01:15 GMT, each lasting approximately 10 minutes. Temperature measurements in the bathroom showed increased humidity during each visit.

Between 12:00 and 14:30 GMT, the person was detected in the living room watching television. At 12:30 GMT, they moved to the kitchen, where they opened the fridge at 12:35 GMT. At 12:45 GMT, they returned to the living room and stayed there until 14:00 GMT. Then they moved to the porch for 15 minutes before returning to the living room by 14:30 GMT.

Between 02:00 and 04:30 GMT, the person was detected in the kitchen repeatedly opening and closing the refrigerator. At 02:00 GMT, they entered the kitchen. Between 02:05 GMT and 04:15 GMT, the fridge was opened and closed 12 times at irregular intervals. The person finally left the kitchen at 04:25 GMT and returned to the bedroom.

Between 18:00 and 20:30 GMT, the person was detected moving through the house in a regular pattern. At 18:00 GMT, they were in the living room, moved to the kitchen at 18:30 GMT where they opened the fridge at 18:35 GMT. At 19:00 GMT, they returned to the living room, then visited the bathroom at 19:45 GMT before returning to the living room by 20:00 GMT. The temperature in the living room remained stable throughout.

Between 06:30 and 08:45 GMT, the person was detected in the bedroom, then moved to the bathroom at 06:45 GMT. The bathroom humidity increased at 06:50 GMT. They entered the kitchen at 07:15 GMT, where the fridge was opened at 07:20 GMT and again at 07:30 GMT. They moved to the living room at 08:00 GMT, where the temperature was 21°C. At 08:30 GMT, they briefly returned to the kitchen before going back to the living room at 08:45 GMT.

Between 22:00 and 23:30 GMT, the person was in the living room until 22:15 GMT. They then moved to the kitchen at 22:20 GMT where the fridge was opened at 22:25 GMT. At 22:30 GMT, they returned to the living room. The living room temperature was 20°C at 22:45 GMT. At 23:00 GMT, they moved to the bedroom where a light was turned on. The person remained in the bedroom until 23:30 GMT.

Between 02:00 and 04:30 GMT, the person was detected in the bedroom at 02:00 GMT. At 02:15 GMT, they moved to the bathroom where humidity increased to 75% at 02:20 GMT. They returned to the bedroom at 02:30 GMT. At 03:15 GMT, they moved to the bathroom again with another humidity increase at 03:20 GMT. At 03:30 GMT, they returned to the bedroom. At 04:00 GMT, they once more went to the bathroom with humidity increasing at 04:05 GMT, returning to the bedroom at 04:15 GMT where they remained until 04:30 GMT.

Between 12:00 and 14:30 GMT, the person was in the living room where the temperature was 22°C. At 12:30 GMT, they moved to the kitchen where the fridge was opened at 12:35 GMT. They returned to the living room at 13:00 GMT. At 13:45 GMT, they went to the porch where the temperature was 17°C. They remained on the porch until 14:15 GMT when they moved to the hall, and then returned to the living room at 14:30 GMT.

Between 03:00 and 06:30 GMT, the person was in the bedroom until 03:30 GMT. At 03:40 GMT, they moved to the kitchen where the fridge was opened at 03:42 GMT, 03:50 GMT, 04:05 GMT, 04:20 GMT, 04:35 GMT, 04:50 GMT, 05:10 GMT, 05:25 GMT, 05:40 GMT, and 06:00 GMT. Kitchen temperature was 19°C at 04:30 GMT. At 06:15 GMT, they moved to the living room and remained there until 06:30 GMT.

Between 17:00 and 19:30 GMT, the person was in the living room where the temperature was 21.5°C. At 17:30 GMT, they moved to the kitchen where the fridge was opened at 17:35 GMT. At 18:00 GMT, they returned to the living room. At 18:45 GMT, they moved to the bedroom where a light was turned on. They remained in the bedroom until 19:30 GMT.

Between 10:00 and 16:00 GMT, the person was in the living room at 10:00 GMT where the temperature was 20.5°C. No movement was detected between 10:00 GMT and 16:00 GMT, with the living room temperature increasing to 22°C at 13:00 GMT.

Between 06:30 and 08:30 GMT, the person was detected in the bedroom, then moved to the bathroom at 06:45 GMT. At 07:10 GMT, they entered the kitchen where the fridge was opened at 07:15 GMT and again at 07:25 GMT. The kitchen kettle was turned on at 07:20 GMT. They remained in the kitchen until 07:40 GMT, then moved to the living room. The person stayed in the living room until 08:20 GMT before returning to the bedroom.

Between 23:00 and 02:30 GMT, the person was detected moving between the bedroom and bathroom multiple times. At 23:10 GMT, they moved from the bedroom to the bathroom, returning to the bedroom at 23:20 GMT. They again went to the bathroom at 23:55 GMT, returning to the bedroom at 00:10 GMT. At 00:45 GMT, they went to the bathroom again, returning to the bedroom at 01:00 GMT. At 01:30 GMT, they went to the bathroom yet again, returning to the bedroom at 01:45 GMT. At 02:15 GMT, they went to the bathroom once more, returning to the bedroom at 02:30 GMT.

Between 12:00 and 14:30 GMT, the person was detected in the living room, then moved to the kitchen at 12:45 GMT. The fridge was opened at 12:50 GMT. At 13:00 GMT, they moved back to the living room. At 13:45 GMT, they went to the porch, where the temperature was measured at 25°C. They returned to the living room at 14:15 GMT and remained there until 14:30 GMT.

Between 03:00 and 06:00 GMT, the fridge in the kitchen was opened 8 times without any occupancy detected in the kitchen or surrounding areas. The fridge was opened at 03:15 GMT, 03:35 GMT, 04:02 GMT, 04:20 GMT, 04:45 GMT, 05:10 GMT, 05:30 GMT, and 05:50 GMT.

Between 17:00 and 19:30 GMT, the person was detected in the living room, then moved to the kitchen at 17:30 GMT. The fridge was opened at 17:35 GMT, and the microwave was turned on at 17:40 GMT. They remained in the kitchen until 18:05 GMT, then moved back to the living room. At 18:45 GMT, they went to the bathroom, where humidity increased to 75%. They returned to the living room at 19:00 GMT and remained there until 19:30 GMT.

Between 22:00 and 08:00 GMT, no movement was detected in any room of the house. The bedroom occupancy sensor showed the person in the bedroom at 22:00 GMT, but no subsequent movement or room changes were detected for 10 hours.

Between 09:00 and 11:30 GMT, the person was detected in the bedroom, then moved to the bathroom at 09:15 GMT. They returned to the bedroom at 09:30 GMT. At 10:00 GMT, they moved to the living room. At 10:30 GMT, they went to the kitchen, where the fridge was opened at 10:35 GMT and the kettle was turned on at 10:40 GMT. At 11:00 GMT, they returned to the living room and remained there until 11:30 GMT.

Between 06:30 and 08:45 GMT, the person was detected in the bedroom, then moved to the bathroom at 06:45 GMT. The bathroom humidity increased at 06:50 GMT. At 07:15 GMT, they entered the kitchen where the temperature was 22°C. The fridge was opened at 07:20 GMT and again at 07:30 GMT. They moved to the living room at 07:45 GMT, where they remained until 08:30 GMT. They then returned to the kitchen briefly before moving to the hall at 08:45 GMT.

Between 22:00 and 23:45 GMT, the person was detected in the living room until 22:30 GMT. They then moved to the kitchen at 22:35 GMT where the fridge was opened. At 22:40 GMT, they moved to the bathroom where humidity increased at 22:45 GMT. They returned to the bedroom at 23:00 GMT. Between 23:05 GMT and 23:45 GMT, the fridge in the kitchen was opened 7 times while no occupancy was detected in the kitchen.

Between 12:00 and 14:30 GMT, the person was detected in the living room. At 12:15 GMT, they moved to the kitchen where they remained until 12:45 GMT. The fridge was opened at 12:20 GMT. Room temperature was measured at 23°C at 12:30 GMT. They then moved to the dining room at 12:45 GMT and stayed there until 13:30 GMT. At 13:30 GMT, they moved to the porch where humidity was measured at 65% at 13:45 GMT. They returned to the living room at 14:00 GMT and remained there until 14:30 GMT.

Between 02:00 and 06:00 GMT, no movement was detected in any room of the house. The bedroom occupancy sensor last detected presence at 02:00 GMT and remained at 0 for the entire 4-hour period. Temperature readings were taken in the bedroom at 03:00 GMT (21°C) and 05:00 GMT (20°C). No other sensor events were recorded during this period.

Between 18:00 and 20:30 GMT, the person was detected in the living room until 18:30 GMT. The room temperature was 22°C at 18:15 GMT. At 18:30 GMT, they moved to the kitchen where the fridge was opened at 18:35 GMT. They remained in the kitchen until 19:00 GMT, then moved to the dining room. At 19:30 GMT, they returned to the living room where they stayed until 20:15 GMT when they moved to the bathroom. Humidity in the bathroom increased to 76% at 20:20 GMT. At 20:30 GMT, they moved to the bedroom.

Between 03:00 and 05:30 GMT, the person was detected moving from the bedroom to the bathroom at 03:15 GMT. At 03:20 GMT, the bathroom humidity increased to 72%.
